Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 249, a bill to redesignate  parts of the Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in honor of  the late Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr.

I thank my friend and fellow New Jerseyan, Congressman Frank Pallone,  for leading this effort. I am a proud…

This legislation would rename two beloved landmarks within Paterson  Great Falls National Historical Park, the Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge  and Overlook Park, as the Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail  Bridge and the Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park.
